title: Facebook Sets Up Team To Study Racial Bias On The Network
text: Facebook announced that the social media company will be a building team to study racial bias in their own algorithms. The company will be looking at the algorithms used on both Facebook and Instagram.

title: Facebook Continues To Allow Political Ads Touting QAnon As It Weighs Crackdown
text: Twitter announced Tuesday it removed 7,000 accounts associated with QAnon on its site and made other sweeping changes to restrict the reach of the conspiracy theory.

title: Buy Facebook Stock Before Q2 Earnings Despite Coronavirus Ad Worries?
text: FB shares rest around 5% off their mid-July highs heading into the release of Facebook's second quarter fiscal 2020 financial results on Wednesday, July 29.

title: 10 Stocks For Midyear 2020

title: Facebook to investigate claims its algorithms are discriminatory

title: Facebook Messenger launches new privacy features
text: Users will have more control over who can see their chats and who can message them directly.

title: Six tech stocks now make up half the value of the Nasdaq 100
text: The surging value of mega-cap tech stocks is giving U.S. index funds, most notably the Nasdaq 100, a hefty concentration in just a few names.

title: Does Facebook Have Upside In The Near Term?
text: After a 65% rise since the March 23 low of this year, at the current price of around $245 per share, we believe Facebook’s stock has no upside left. FB stock has increased from $148 to $245 off the recent bottom, better than the S&P which increased by around 45%.

title: How Facebook rallies another 65% to hit $400, according to chart
text: Rosenblatt Securities upped its Facebook price target to a Street high this week. Todd Gordon of Ascent Wealth Partners sees an even bigger move.

title: 4 Stocks That Can Hit a $1 Trillion Valuation Next
text: Apple, Microsoft, Amazon, and Alphabet are already part of the trillion-dollar club. These companies could be the next to join.
